idea:
Vision of Techset Technology Private Limited "TTPL" is to manufacturer comfortable, safe & crack-resistant (1) Lead Vinyl Aprons and (2) Lead Vinyl Cartons providing the best available protection against X-ray radiations.

Presently India is highly dependent on import of such products. TTPL plans to manufacture such products in India.

idea: Serenite sports pvt ltd mainly focuses on enhancing kids/youth/elderly people to be an active sports participant.We by constructing synthetic artificial grass turfs all over Mumbai are primarily focusing on people to play any sport they wish to on this artificial synthetic grass turf and also get people to be a part of mediation,yoga,corporate events and other fitness activities performed on this turf.
name: Serenite Sports pvt ltd

idea:
Talegaon Farms is a social enterprise trying to bring prosperity into the lives of dairy farmers by addressing issues in the supply chain.

We work with Farmer Producer Organisations (FPOs) - and help them produce products of extremely high quality and market the same under our brand - Talegaon Farms.

We strongly believe that the issues in supply chain can be addressed when concerns of the two key stakeholders - farmers and consumers are taken care and when the organizations care for their wellbeing.

Over the last few years we have learnt that FPOs have most resources at their disposal - raw material, land, fodder, workforce, backward integration and also can get access to capital via a lot of Govenment schemes – but the insurmountable challenge for them is ‘how to generate revenues without having to depend on the whims and fancies of middlemen, traders and government subsidies’. Their revenue flow is usually skewed/seasons or they generally acts as aggregators – in our case, the FPO that we work with collects milk but sells a huge chunk (90% of the total milk collected) to other dairies.

The real impact is when the FPO is able to make money out of value added products, trading of milk (raw materials) puts them in a very vulnerable position- milk has little or no shelf life, the variation i prices of milk is huge and there is a lot of variation in milk collection through the years. Also, the margins on trading of milk are quite thin. We are trying to help the FPO move from trading of milk to making revenues by making extremely high quality value added products without having to worry about the aspects like marketing, branding, logistics, packaging etc.

Talegaon Farms doesn’t need to build factories or invest in any other hardcore infrastructure. We try to fix the ones that already there – we make most of the resources

We are currently working with an FPO in Maharashtra to produce ghee as per the standards/guidelines set by us. The FPO owns majority of the supply chain - from manufacturing to packaging (we provide the packaging materials to the FPO).We, Talegaon Farms are responsible for building the brand, marketing and customer acquisition.
name: MONTAGNA CREAMERY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
1. To carry on the business of consultancy in the field of information technology and software development in all its forms and perspectives and to undertake all such activities as are connected, linked or associated with software development, operation, data communication, IT Recruitment and Marketing and other related services.

name: CAPTECH TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Professional chocolatier, ecucanist, consultant, manufacturer and online course provider.


Have been teaching and consulting for last 8 years. started manufacturing unit in 2019. 


wants to excel as online course provider, done sales of 30 lacs in past one year. Now wants to consolidate operations and grow. 


Started manufacturing in 2019, pure chocolates, bean to bar in mumbai. Doing sales but need to improvise.


Established very healthy chocolates and protein products. 

Need mentorship to tap into market and strengthen operations. 


open to expand as social enterprise, helping generate employment for hundreds
